speed 0.0.1
  • Reference

Verify inputs for speed function

Source: R/speed_df.R
dot-verify_speed_inputs_df.Rd

Verify inputs for speed function

Usage

.verify_speed_inputs_df(
  data,
  swap,
  swap_within,
  spatial_factors,
  iterations,
  early_stop_iterations,
  quiet,
  seed,
  swap_count,
  swap_all_blocks,
  adaptive_swaps,
  start_temp,
  cooling_rate
)

Arguments

data

Data frame containing the initial design

swap

Column name of the treatment to swap

swap_within

Column name defining groups within which to swap treatments

spatial_factors

Formula specifying spatial factors

iterations

Maximum number of iterations

early_stop_iterations

Number of iterations without improvement before early stopping

quiet

Whether to suppress progress messages

seed

Random seed for reproducibility

swap_count

Number of swaps to perform in each iteration

swap_all_blocks

Whether to perform swaps in all blocks

adaptive_swaps

Whether to adapt number of swaps based on temperature

start_temp

Starting temperature for simulated annealing

cooling_rate

Cooling rate for temperature

Value

NULL (invisibly)

On this page
